content: crocheted cat ear hat this hat was inspired by the pussy hat project my knitting is really slow and i was not going to be able to finish a hat in time for the woman s march on washington so i improvised a crocheted version of the hat this hat was made with worsted weight yarn held double supplies  yarn 120 yards bulky weight or 240 yards worsted held double o in photo is knit picks mighty stitch in pucker worsted held double  k hook  yarn needle for sewing together stitches used  foundation double_crochet fdc  slip_stitch  chain stitch  front post double_crochet fpdc  back post double_crochet bpdc  double_crochet double_crochet note chain 2 at beginning of rounds does not count as a stitch pattern  foundation fdc 54 increase or decrease by multiple of 6 to fit as needed join to first stitch with a slip_stitch 54 double_crochet a alternatively chain 56 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in each chain to end  round 1 chain 2 *fpdc 3 stitches bpdc 3 stitches repeat from * around join with a slip stitch to first stitch 54 double_crochet  round 2 5 repeat round 1  round 6 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around join to beginning double_crochet with a slip_stitch  round 7 12 or 13 repeat round 6 for desired fit finish off  finishing fold hat in half and whipstitch together weave in ends a alternatively turn hat inside out fold in half and single_crochet or slip_stitch together permission to make sell donate or whatever is granted i didn t reinvent the wheel or anything just link it back to my pattern page
